Headline: #108 Halsted/95th Temporary Southbound Reroute near 127th/Lowe
ShortDescription: Southbound 108 Halsted/95th buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 127th, Lowe, Vermont,127th and Halsted: due to street blockage near 127th/Lowe.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

 

Southbound #108 Halsted/95th buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 127th, Lowe, Vermont, 127th, Halsted and over regular route: due to street blockage near 127th/Lowe.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Washington/Wells
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Washington/Wells due to a door problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Washington/Wells due to a door problem on a train

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#37 Sedgwick

##152 Addison

 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
